infotexts.afflictiondescription.cowboy: Cowboys and men are two totally different breeds. Cowboys shoot faster and are more resistant to stun.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.minorhealing: Provides a healing effect over time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.mothersembrace: Mother's Embrace provides bleeding and blood loss resistance for true believers.
infotexts.entitydescription.3030round: .30 caliber round for a Lever Action Rifle
infotexts.entitydescription.3030rounddepletedfuel: .30 caliber round for a Lever Action Rifle. Along with increased penetration, the ammo has been special-made to also inflict radiation sickness on the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.40mmempgrenade: Ammunition for grenade launcher. Effective against Guardians.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingmaskunique: Nothing is out of mother's reach.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgun_overvolted: An overvolted version of the coilgun with a higher rate of fire, but also higher power demands.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxcopper: Ammunition for the coilgun that higher penetration then lead, but less than piercing.
infotexts.entitydescription.depletedshotgunslugshe: A shotgun slug round made from depleted fuel.
infotexts.entitydescription.doublecoilgun_overvolt: An overvolted double coilgun with a higher rate of fire, but also higher power demands..
infotexts.entitydescription.ed_raptorbanespear: A harpoon infused with Rapter Bane for the harpoon gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.engineeringheadset: Longer range headset that requires batteries.
infotexts.entitydescription.fuelrodcase: A case for safely storing volatile fuel rods.
infotexts.entitydescription.fuelrodvolatile: A fuel rod that has been further refined to supply power for much longer than normal. However, its radiation shielding can only partially limit the emitted ambient radiation, so the rod must be handled with care.
infotexts.entitydescription.leveractionrifle: Effective against unarmored targets. No Cowboy should leave how without it.
infotexts.entitydescription.materialcrate: A crate for safely storing materials.
infotexts.entitydescription.medicalcase: A case for safely storing medical supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.medicalhelmet: While the helmet won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it is better than no protection.
infotexts.entitydescription.mininglaser: Cuts through various materials using a laser.
infotexts.entitydescription.minorhealingtonic: Provides a healing effect over time with no known side effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearlaser: A powerful nuclear laser that does massive burn damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearlaserammobox: A heavly shielded box containing uranium based nuclear fuel. Used as ammo by the Nuclear Laser
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearlaserfulguriuma: A heavly shielded box containing fulgurium based nuclear fuel. Used as ammo by the Nuclear Laser
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearlaserloader: Feeds nuclear ammunition into a linked Nuclear Laser.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearlaserthoriumamm: A heavly shielded box containing thorium based nuclear fuel. Used as ammo by the Nuclear Laser
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshrapnelshell: A reloadable burst-type munition for the railgun that fires a large number of blunt pellets in a wide spread.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshrapnelshellpe: A pellet fired out of a shrapnel shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.shotgunslugshell: A shotgun slug round. Powerful, but fairly low penetration.
infotexts.entitydescription.suitcrate: A vessel in which diving suits may be stored.
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalhelmet: While the helmet won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it is better than no protection.
infotexts.entitydescription.thoriumfuelrodvolatile: A Thorium fuel rod that has been further refined to supply power for much longer than normal. However, its radiation shielding can only partially limit the emitted ambient radiation, so the rod must be handled with care.
infotexts.talentdescription.commendations: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a ‖color:gui.orange‖Commendation‖end‖.\nWhenever you complete all missions gain a ‖color:gui.orange‖Commendation‖end‖.\nWhen you apply a ‖color:gui.orange‖Commendation‖end‖ on another character, give them [selfxpgain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.miner: Unlock recipe: [itemname].\nWhenever you deconstruct an ore, you have a [probability]% chance to gain double the output.
infotexts.talentdescription.waterprankster: Clown Power gives you immunity to pressure and allows you to swim [swimspeedvalue]% faster.
